snippet: Kasey Kahne won his second Nascar Sprint Cup race of the season by holding off Denny Hamlin at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon.
abstract: Kasey Kahne wins his second Nascar Sprint Cup race of the season at New Hampshire Motor Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Kasey Kahne won his second Nascar Sprint Cup race of the season by holding off Denny Hamlin at New Hampshire Motor Speedway in Loudon.

headline.seo: Kasey Kahne Wins at New Hampshire, 2nd Victory of Season
headline.main: Kahne Wins at New Hampshire, 2nd Victory of Season
